attributes.action: Withdraw the United Kingdom from the European Union
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the people of the U.K. are British and overwhelmingly proud to be so. we do not wish to be European or be ruled by unelected bureaucrats in a foreign country. Give us back our sovreignty on allow us to find our own destiny on the increasingly Global world we live in

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
